omopColumns.name: nhs_number
omopColumns.query:
select
    NHS_NUMBER,
    EVENT,
    EVENT_START_DT_TM,
    RESULT_VALUE
from ##duckdb_source##
where lower(EVENT) like '%comment%'

omopColumns.name: observation_concept_id
omopColumns.operation_description: Constant value set to `37053687`. Lab report general comments
